description:
Nice add-on to the classical Rosenlaui Inf. You only need to walk about 20 more minutes. The canyon is primarily equiped for now, some downclimbs are quite hard (so if you repeat it, bringing a drill and at least 5 anchors is a good idea.

Approach

Same as the Lower part, but then continue another 20 min towards the Dossenh√ºtte. At a height of 1670m, there is a bridge over the canyon, this is where it starts.

Descent

The first part has a nice narrow. Then you'll have to go across a more bouldery section, before reaching the first bigger (20m) abseil. From there on it is a quite deep and large canyon.

Exit

Go back through the hikong trail, or continue immediatly with the Rosenlaui inf.

Red tape

Beta sites

Trip reports and media

Background
name: Rosenlaui (Upper Right)
